item.title: Berkshire Hathaway to buy Occidental's OxyChem for $9.7 billion, in Buffett's biggest deal in three years
item.description: Warren Buffett is staying active even as he gets ready to hand over the CEO reins at the end of this year.

item.title: Tom Lee sees S&P 500 topping 7,000 by year-end, says don't be fooled by shutdown calamity talk
item.description: "We would not lean bearish because of shutdowns," Lee wrote in a note to clients Thursday. "If stocks are down, we would be dip buyers."
